original_title: Der kleine Eisbär - Besuch vom Südpol
overview: Lars is experiencing exciting adventures again. First he discovers a sunken ship with Robby, then he drives away evil bandits and finally a strange bird appears at the North Pole: It's Caruso, the singing penguin.
tagline: Lars and his friends enter a whole new world of exciting adventure and fun!
title: The Little Polar Bear: A Visitor from the South Pole
